function.name: sylvester
function.short: Solve Sylvester's equaterion AX + XB = C

long.para: This function solves for X by converting the quaternion arguments to adjoint arrays using adjoint, and then calling the &matlab; function of the same name (introduced with Matlab R2014a). It will work for biquaternion arrays, and for both scalar quaternions and arrays of quaternions subject to the same rules of conformability as the &matlab; function.
